attributeList.name: ground_energies
attributeList.doc: Ground state energies of each configuration of the spin system

attributeList.name: ground_states
attributeList.doc: Ground state of each configuration of the spin system

attributeList.name: hamiltonians
attributeList.doc: Hamiltonian of the system in the Pauli basis

attributeList.name: num_phases
attributeList.doc: Number of phases for the considered configurations

attributeList.name: order_params
attributeList.doc: Value of order parameters for identifying phases

attributeList.name: parameters
attributeList.doc: Tunable parameters that determine the spin system configuration

attributeList.name: shadow_basis
attributeList.doc: Randomized Pauli basis for the classical shadow measurements

attributeList.name: shadow_meas
attributeList.doc: Results from the classical shadow measurements

attributeList.name: spin_system
attributeList.doc: Basic description of the spin system including its name, Hamiltonian string, etc
